about.summary: Implements biplot (2d and 3d) of multivariate data based on principal components analysis and diagnostic tools of the quality of the reduction.

name: r-bpca
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3-2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bpca
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bpca_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bpca/bpca_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4be1a98f94a002a7077586870118f7189fd526dcf51c385360c627a579e87960

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rgl
    - r-scatterplot3d
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rgl
    - r-scatterplot3d

test:
  commands:
    - LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${BUILD_PREFIX}/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib64 $R -e "library('bpca')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bpca')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=bpca
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Implements biplot (2d and 3d) of multivariate data based on principal components analysis and diagnostic tools of the quality of the reduction.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bpca
# Type: Package
# Title: Biplot of Multivariate Data Based on Principal Components Analysis
# Version: 1.3-0
# Date: 2018-06-07
# Author: Jose Claudio Faria, Clarice Garcia Borges Demetrio and Ivan Bezerra Allaman
# Maintainer: Jose Claudio Faria <joseclaudio.faria@gmail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 2.6.0), scatterplot3d, rgl
# Description: Implements biplot (2d and 3d) of multivariate data based on principal components analysis and diagnostic tools of the quality of the reduction.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Encoding: latin1
# LazyLoad: yes
# LazyData: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-06-11 21:39:54 UTC; jcfaria
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-06-11 22:04:46 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
